base_description: Wooden desk with six drawers, brown and rectangular.
part_description: The desk has six drawers, three on each side, arranged vertically. Each drawer has a round, gold-colored handle. The top surface is flat and rectangular, supported by two pedestal bases.
internal_interaction_description: The drawers slide in and out of the desk smoothly, facilitated by internal rails. Each drawer is aligned vertically, providing organized storage space. The handles are securely attached, allowing easy grip for opening and closing.
external_interaction_description: The desk provides a stable surface for writing or placing items such as computers and books. It can be positioned against a wall or in the center of a room. The drawers offer storage for office supplies, accessible to users seated at the desk.
